Productivity tool for Consultants and Freelancers

Here is what keeps us busy these days: making our life simpler. How, by developing a simple but productive tool to track time, send invoices, manage projects and record payments. We’re currently polishing the invoicing piece that should be ready in a couple of weeks. Projectlog is a web-based application dedicated to people who want to stay on top of their business and simply access key information like (When is my invoice due? How much budget did I burn? Did I receive payment for this invoice? How many days left on this contract? Where is my timesheet?…).

Check out some of the screenshots and contact us if you want an invitation to beta.
